# hitachi_vsp_one_port (Data Source)

Datasource to list ports in VSP One storage with optional filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Hitachi VSP One Port Information Retrieval
#
# This section defines a data source block that retrieves detailed information
# about a specific storage port managed by Hitachi storage systems through the
# Virtual Storage Platform One Block Administrator.
#
# The "hitachi_vsp_one_port" data source allows you to access configuration
# and property details of an existing port, enabling you to reference it in
# Terraform configurations and automate resource dependencies.
#
# The data source returns comprehensive information including:
#   - Basic port details (ID, protocol, speeds, security settings)
#   - Protocol-specific information (FC, iSCSI, NVMe-TCP)
#   - Network configuration (IP addresses, VLAN, TCP settings)
#
# Adjust the parameters (serial and id) to match your environment
# and retrieve information for the desired port.
#

data "hitachi_vsp_one_port" "port" {
  serial = 12345
  port_id = "CX-X"  # Port ID to retrieve
}

output "port_info" {
  description = "Detailed information about the port"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_port.port.port_info
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `port_id` (String) ID of the port to retrieve.
- `serial` (Number) Serial number of storage

### Optional

- `port_info` (Block List) Port Information (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--port_info"></a>
### Nested Schema for `port_info`

Optional:

- `fc_information` (Block List) Fibre Channel information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info--fc_information))
- `id` (String) Port ID.
- `iscsi_information` (Block List) iSCSI information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info--iscsi_information))

Read-Only:

- `actual_port_speed` (String) Actual port speed.
- `nvme_tcp_information` (Block List) NVMe-TCP information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info--nvme_tcp_information))
- `port_iscsi_name` (String) Port iSCSI name.
- `port_security` (Boolean) Port security setting.
- `port_speed` (String) Port speed.
- `port_wwn` (String) Port World Wide Name.
- `protocol` (String) Port protocol.

<a id="nestedblock--port_info--fc_information"></a>
### Nested Schema for `port_info.fc_information`

Optional:

- `al_pa` (String) Arbitrated Loop Physical Address.
- `connection_type` (String) Connection type.
- `fabric_switch_setting` (Boolean) Fabric switch setting.
- `port_mode` (String) Port mode.
- `sfp_data_transfer_rate` (String) SFP data transfer rate.


<a id="nestedblock--port_info--iscsi_information"></a>
### Nested Schema for `port_info.iscsi_information`

Optional:

- `vlan_use` (Boolean) VLAN usage setting.

Read-Only:

- `delayed_ack` (Boolean) Delayed ACK setting.
- `ip_mode` (String) IP mode setting.
- `ipv4_information` (Block List) IPv4 information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info--iscsi_information--ipv4_information))
- `ipv6_information` (Block List) IPv6 information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--port_info--iscsi_information--ipv6_information))
- `is_ipv6_updating` (Boolean) IPv6 updating status.
- `isns_server_ip_address` (String) iSNS server IP address.
- `isns_server_mode` (Boolean) iSNS server mode setting.
- `isns_server_port` (Number) iSNS server port number.
- `keep_alive_timer` (Number) Keep alive timer setting.
- `link_mtu_size` (String) Link MTU size.
- `mtu_size` (String) MTU size.
- `selective_ack` (Boolean) Selective ACK setting.
- `tcp_port` (Number) TCP port number.
- `virtual_port_enabled` (Boolean) Virtual port enabled setting.
- `vlan_id` (Number) VLAN ID.
- `window_size` (String) TCP window size.
